about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with experience in creating modern web and mobile applications, focusing on performance, security, and user experience. I'm passionate about technology and innovation, always seeking to create solutions that transform the way people interact with the digital world.

profile.name: Gregory Vallim
profile.subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative and impactful solutions. Specialized in modern technologies with focus on performance, security, and exceptional user experience.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Over 5 years developing modern web and mobile applications. Specialized in creating intuitive interfaces, scalable systems, and solutions that really make a difference for companies and users.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: Create digital experiences that transform lives and businesses through technology. I believe that every project should be an opportunity to innovate and positively impact the world around us.
